## Description
[Describe your changes here. What does this PR do?]

## Type of change
- [ ] New Plugin Submission
- [ ] Plugin Update
- [ ] Bug fix (registry/docs)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Checklist

### For Plugin Submissions:
- [ ] I have added my plugin to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`.
- [ ] I have validated the JSON (`python -m json.tool .claude-plugin/marketplace.json`).
- [ ] My plugin repository is public and has a valid `plugin.json`.
- [ ] My plugin repository has a tagged release.

### For Code/Docs Changes:
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
